page.title: 18HAWTHORNE FARM
page.content: Hawthorne Farm is farmed by the Sturman brothers, Keith,Derek,Henry and Neville.They own 50 acres and rent another 200,which is divided into 7 fields.Neville, who was interviewed, has been farming for 20 years and works 14 hours daily. The farm has been in the family for approximately 150 years.The farm is mainly a{cattle}farm.There is a dairy as well as cattle being fattened for beef.They have{goats}for their milk and have it for the family,{hens}for their eggs also for the family,{sheep for buying and selling and{horses}for their children. The crops they grow are{wheat}and {silage,}silage for the animals and wheat for selling.
